@EmmaButcher_ My usual no. 1 recommendation Mary's Milk Bar (icecream of dreams) is sadly closed this week!! Looking forward to seeing you on Tues!

@EmmaButcher_ Go see: The Dovecot (lovely tapestry weaving studio/exhibition space/cafe), St Cecilias Hall (small but excellent musical instrument museum), Curiouser & Curiouser (heavenly art/gifts/stationary/treats), Lovecrumbs (cakes of dreams) & and the bookshops around Westport!
